nodes.text: The smuggler Roark Garnet once visited a planet located in a trinary system.
The planet orbited three suns, which made the days on the world hot. The atmosphere was breathable by Humans, and natural canyons formed part of the planet's geographical features.

At some point during his career, Roark Garnet traveled to the planet, and ended up involved in a speeder bike chase with a stormtrooper. Garnet tried to lose the stormtrooper in the planet's canyons, but both drivers collided with an obstacle.
